DOC.brief_summary: Two memory research finding ( space test effect ) dramatically improve retention learning , largely ignored educator . The researcher develop novel form online education ( term 'spaced education ' ) base two effect show randomized trial improve knowledge acquisition boost learning retention . Using prostate cancer screen experimental system , researcher investigate whether spaced education could durably improve clinician ' behavior , knowledge .
DOC.brief_title: Spaced Education Optimize Prostate Cancer Screening
DOC.criteria: Primary care provider ( physician , nurse practitioner , physician assistant ) 8 Veterans Affairs ( VA ) hospitals New England region ( Veterans Integrated Service Network 1 [ VISN1 ] ) eligible enroll . Primary care provider ( PCPs ) order PSA screen prostate cancer le 10 time year exclude .
